text: Shivangi Verma is an Indian actress, entertainer and television personality. who mostly works in Hindi television serials. she is known for playing role in Hamari Sister Didi, TV, Biwi aur Main, Bhutu and others. == Television == Year Show Channel Role 2013 Nach Baliye Season 6 Star Plus Finalist 2014 Hamari Sister Didi Sony Pal Meher 2014 Har Mushkil Ka Hal Akbar Birbal Big Magic 2015 Reporters Sony Entertainment Television Richa Lakhani 2017 TV, Biwi aur Main Sony SAB Maya 2017 Bhutu Zee TV Mohini 2018 Mirzapur (TV series) Amazon Prime Video on promo shoot 2021 Choti Sarrdaarni Colors TV Samaira == References == Category:Living people Category:Indian television actors
title: Shivangi Verma
